```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(imputeTS)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```

```{r} 
iris_with_missing %>%  
  mutate(
    Species = replace_na(Species, "virginica"),
    Sepal.Length = na_mean(Sepal.Length, option = "mean", maxgap = Inf),
    Sepal.Width = na_mean(Sepal.Width, option = "mean", maxgap = Inf),
    Petal.Length = na_mean(Petal.Length, option = "mean", maxgap = Inf),
    Petal.Width = na_mean(Petal.Width, option = "mean", maxgap = Inf))
```
